description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync E223W - 22" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
NEC MultiSync E223W features an extremely thin LED backlight panel which results in an ultra-modern and slim design in combination with a perfect feature set for the standard corporate office. The display offers 110 mm height adjustment and a broad connectivity with three inputs DisplayPort, DVI-D and D-Sub.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately), cable organizer
No Touch Auto Adjust, ErgoDesign, Intelligent Power Manager (IPM), power off timer, sRGB colour management, HDCP, NaViSet, Eco-Mode, OSD lock
service support details: Limited warranty - 3 years ¦ Limited warranty - backlight - 3 years
